MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)

param.name: disposing
param.span: ，表示釋放 Managed 和 Unmanaged 資源，，則表示只釋放 Unmanaged 資源。

span.span: to release both the managed and unmanaged resources; to release only the unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 釋放 物件所使用的 Unmanaged 資源，並選擇性釋放 Managed 資源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the object and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當處置參數是`true`，則`Dispose`方法會釋放所有的受管理物件所持有的資源這個物件參考。When the disposing parameter is `true`, the `Dispose` method releases all the resources held by the managed objects that this object references.

para.span: 方法可以由其他物件呼叫多次。

span.span: The method can be called multiple times by other objects.

para.span: 當覆寫它，請確定不會參考已在先前呼叫中處置的物件。

span.span: When overriding it, ensure that you do not reference objects that have been disposed in an earlier call to .

para.span: 如需如何實作這個方法的詳細資訊，請參閱[實作 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

span.span: For more information about how to implement this method, see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).

para.span: 如需詳細的 Dispose 和 Finalize 方法的詳細資訊，請參閱[實作 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

span.span: For more information about the Dispose and Finalize methods, see [Implementing a Dispose method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).

related.span: ASP.NET 控制項設計工具概觀
擴充設計階段支援

abstract member ExecuteChooseDataSourcePostSteps : unit -> unit override this.ExecuteChooseDataSourcePostSteps : unit -> unit

summary.span: 使用者在設計階段選取資料來源之後，由設計主應用程式 (例如 [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)]) 所呼叫。

span.span: Called by a design host such as [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)] after a user selects a data source at design time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法可供衍生的類別需要額外的處理之後，使用者在設計階段選取資料來源。This method is available for derived classes that require additional processing after a user selects a data source at design time.

related.span: ASP.NET 控制項設計工具概觀
擴充設計階段支援
